name: The Room (itch) (Nicole Evans, lucky_conqueror, alyg563)
description:
You play as a priest, tasked to locate and contain a set of haunted items before you're taken out by the demon who is possessing them. Watch and listen carefully, because the objects will change slightly when out of view.

Controls:

Move - W,A,S,D

Grab/Set Object - Left Mouse (Click)

Investigate - Right Mouse (Hold)

Credits:

Barry Evans - Scripting

Nicole Evans - Environment Art

Jacob Freeland - Audio

Alyssa Garcia - Design/Systems

Liz Newgard - General Art

10/02/22 - Game Jam
